featured.text: Captivated by the utterly fantastic sights Langford described, Moran became eager to see this odd territory for himself.
We want to believe in fantastic creatures in imaginary lands.

At the end of the class, you __(25)__ with you classmates the meals you have created, and you will leave with recipe handouts and , more importantly, the ability to cook two weeks of fantastic, low-cost meals.

definition.example: The view from the mountain was absolutely fantastic.
